name: Los Angeles
subtitle: The city of angels
text: Historically home to the Chumash and Tongva, Los Angeles was claimed by Juan Rodr√≠guez Cabrillo for Spain in 1542 along with the rest of what would become Alta California. The city was officially founded on September 4, 1781, by Spanish governor Felipe de Neve. It became a part of Mexico in 1821 following the Mexican War of Independence.
